name: Scale Protection
description: Reduces Magic and Melee Heroic Damage and increases Heroic Defense if a Karon is equipped. This is a passive skill.

name: Crushing Rip Attack
description: Powerful Magic Heroic Attack in a line if a Karon is equipped.

name: Iron Claw Boom
description: Powerful Magic Heroic Attack within range around you if a Karon is equipped.

name: Over the Dragon
description: Temporarily increases all Heroic Damage Defenses if a Karon is equipped.

name: Frightful Wingover
description: Causes Fear with a certain chance after a powerful Magic Heroic Attack within range if a Karon is equipped.

name: Blood Vein
description: Increases Heroic Defense, Movement Speed and Skill Casting time if a Karon is equipped. This is a passive skill.

name: Oppressive Blow
description: Temporarily causes Cower with a certain chance after a powerful Magic Heroic Attack within range around you if a Karon is equipped.

name: Obliterating Breath
description: Temporarily sacrifices Heroic Attack Power to increase Heroic Defense and all Heroic Resistances and reduce Skill Casting time if a Karon is equipped.

name: Dragon Presence
description: [Party] Temporarily increases Heroic Attack Power and the stats of you and your party members within range if a Karon is equipped.

name: Elemental Maelstrom
description: Causes Disease with a certain chance after a powerful Magic Heroic Attack within range if a Karon is equipped.
